Text: Re Local Production July Cc Once our production pool is set up I would like to transfer the CESENA meters into our pool What do you need from me to transfer these meters Thanks Paul Forwarded by Paul J LeanzaDUBEES on PM Chris CT PM To Paul J ES cc Subject Re Local Production July Forwarded by Chris GermanyHOUECT on PM on PM To cc Destephanis Kara Kinney Doug Subject Re Local Production July Hi Carol Can you help me with the below information I am looking to turn over our local production After August we wont be in business anymore and this local production that is in our name is really Enron North Americas local production I had suggested that Enron Chris Germany set up a local agg pool or if he was selling it to someone else to let me know so that we can turn this production over ASAP I am looking to write a letter to Peoples to give them formal intent and need to know if I need to include meter identification numbers in the letter currently I do not know what these numbers are I apologize for this being such a mess but I have been trying to get this cleared up and seem to have no luck Thanks again for your help cc Subject Local Production July Hi Karen Please nominate a volume of dths for the month of July for CES local production Please let me know if you need something more from me I understand that Clinton Energy is setting up a pool and will soon be able to take over our local production I will be sending in a letter soon relinquishing the local production is there a meter number or identification number that I will need to mention in the letter Thanks Heidi Boyd

Re PNG Local Gas Pool Cc say the contact is Chris Germany at ENA His number is We should be paying ENA on actual volume produced If not we will need to make an adjustment to the prior invoices Pat we should probably talk about this Pat Eberts PM To Paul J ES cc Subject PNG Local Gas Pool Who is your contact at Enron for this pool name and phone number I would like to contact them about the invoicing and trueup on this pool
Re Peoples for Sep Cc will nom it from their pool Chris CT PM To Paul J ES cc Subject Peoples for Sep The Power Gas Marketing supply for Sep is DTH

Re PNG Local Production July Cc what I know We started pulling MCF dth from pool NPB effective which was changed to dth effective Im assuming pool NPB is the CESENA nonpriority pool Let me know if we need to do anything different on our side Paul Chris CT PM To ENRON cc Angie NRON Paul J ES John M NRON Subject Re PNG Local Production July Actually we should be nominating only month from Power Gas and day from Phillips Production That works out to about day I just spoke to Samson and he agrees the volume for July should only be for the month AND Angie my super fantastic cant say enough good things about her will probably be my boss someday and sometimes acts like it CNG scheduler has agreed to help out any way she can She knows escript pretty well Chat with Doug if you guys agree Angie can use your ID and password and figure out how to run all the reports we need back to January Also we will not know the actuals for July production until September sometime Effective August st the Phillips wells should be transferred to Clintons brand new pool and Clinton will also nominate the Power Gas pool gas Doug John Singer said he does not have any production reports from Heidi With Angies help we could probably clear up the CNG LDC activity fairly easy Let me know what you guys think on PM To cc Kinney Doug Subject PNG Local Production July Hi Paul and Chris Our friend Sampson at Power Gas still maintains that their local production behind PNG has not been nominated for July yet which was dthmonth Did you guys do a deal for this gas too He usually nominates it all on one day so ClintonCES needs to coordinate with him what day to do it on right now the gas is out there on his side on the th I know Heidi nominated the Phillips gas baseloaded thru the month at day but I was not sure about the Power until I checked and sure enough the nom isnt out there yet I can get help nominating it from PNG to get it through CES pool but I want to make sure thats what we need to do Just give me the word and I will call Sampson to get it done but I will make it clear to him that this is the last month hell need to talk to me about it Thank you very much for the clarifications Kara D aka the lone ranger at CES
Re Peoples for Sep Cc will nom it from their pool Chris CT PM To Paul J ES cc Subject Peoples for Sep The Power Gas Marketing supply for Sep is DTH

Re Local Production July Cc Once our production pool is set up I would like to transfer the CESENA meters into our pool What do you need from me to transfer these meters Thanks Paul Forwarded by Paul J LeanzaDUBEES on PM Chris CT PM To Paul J ES cc Subject Re Local Production July Forwarded by Chris GermanyHOUECT on PM on PM To cc Destephanis Kara Kinney Doug Subject Re Local Production July Hi Carol Can you help me with the below information I am looking to turn over our local production After August we wont be in business anymore and this local production that is in our name is really Enron North Americas local production I had suggested that Enron Chris Germany set up a local agg pool or if he was selling it to someone else to let me know so that we can turn this production over ASAP I am looking to write a letter to Peoples to give them formal intent and need to know if I need to include meter identification numbers in the letter currently I do not know what these numbers are I apologize for this being such a mess but I have been trying to get this cleared up and seem to have no luck Thanks again for your help cc Subject Local Production July Hi Karen Please nominate a volume of dths for the month of July for CES local production Please let me know if you need something more from me I understand that Clinton Energy is setting up a pool and will soon be able to take over our local production I will be sending in a letter soon relinquishing the local production is there a meter number or identification number that I will need to mention in the letter Thanks Heidi Boyd
